Zend_Http  
Client_Adapter  
No 
No 

Description

An adapter class for Zend_Http_Client based on the curl extension.

Curl requires libcurl. See for full requirements the PHP manual: http://php.net/curl


Methods

__construct, close, connect, getConfig, getHandle, read, readHeader, setConfig, setCurlOption, setOutputStream, write,
